code: import{useState,useEffect}from'react';const useFetch=endpoint=>{const[data,setData]=useState(null);const[isPending,setIsPending]=useState(true);const[errorMessage,setError]=useState(null);useEffect(()=>{fetch(endpoint).then(res=>{if(!res.ok){throw Error('could not fetch data');}return res.json();}).then(data=>{setIsPending(false);setData(data);}).catch(e=>{setIsPending(false);setError('dwadaw');});},[endpoint]);return{data,isPending,errorMessage};};export default useFetch;
